heroSection.intro: I'm Hande. I am a frontend developer. I can craft solid and scalable frontend products. Let's meet!
heroSection.ctaHTML: Currently looking for a job as a Front-end developer

profile.aboutme: I am an aspiring front-end developer with a growth mindset to gain new skills and constantly improve myself with new challenges.  After working as a civil engineer for 4 years and as an accountant for 3 years, I decided to realize my dream of becoming a software developer and improving myself in the frontend field by completing the 3-month intensive Workintech front-end development program.
